parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: Swing
parameter.description: Set Swing value from 1F/.5C to 4F/2.0C Available settings: 1 - 4

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: Differntial
parameter.description: Set Differential value from 1F/.5C to 4F/2.0C Available settings: 1 - 4

parameter.name: config_3_2
parameter.label: 3: Set Filter Counter
parameter.description: Set filter replacement timer from 500 to 4000 hours.

parameter.name: config_5_1
parameter.label: 5: Scale of Temperature
parameter.description: Set Temperature Scale to Farhenheit or Centigrade. DEFAULT =1 Farhenheit

parameter.name: config_6_1
parameter.label: 6: Upper Limit of Setpoint A
parameter.description: Determines Upper Limit of set point A. Unit in celsius A=(B+2)min (37.0 C)max, Unit in Fahrenheit A=(B+4)min (99.0 F)max

parameter.name: config_7_1
parameter.label: 7: Lower Limit of Setpoint B
parameter.description: Determines Lower Limit of set point B. Unit in celsius (5.0 C to 35.0 C) Unit in Fahrenheit (41.0 F to 95.0 F)

parameter.name: config_9_1
parameter.label: 9: Time Format
parameter.description: Configures for 12 or 24 Hour format. Default is 12 Hours.

parameter.name: config_10_1
parameter.label: 10: Repeat Basic Set Counter
parameter.description: Thermostat sends "Basic Set" command to its association node repeatedly ever X minutes. 0 = Disabled or Set to Enabled Values available 3 to 255.

parameter.name: config_11_1
parameter.label: 11: Trigger AUTO report if room temperature is different from last report.
parameter.description: 0 = Disabled or set value from 1 to 8 where each number corresponds to 1 Degree F or .5 Degrees Celsius.

parameter.name: config_12_1
parameter.label: 12: Sensor temperature calibration.
parameter.description: 0 = Disabled or set value from 1 to 10 in 1 degree F increments or -1 to -10 in 1 degree F increments .

parameter.name: config_13_1
parameter.label: 13: AUTO report by time interval.
parameter.description: 0 = Disabled or set value from 1 to 16 where 1 = .5 hours and each consecutive number increases time by .5 hours.

parameter.name: group_1
parameter.label: Heat Pump
parameter.description: You can assign up to 4 nodes between groups 1 and 2 but the total of both groups cannot exceed 4. Example (Group 1) 3 Nodes, (Group 2) 1 Nodes.

parameter.name: group_2
parameter.label: Compressor
parameter.description: You can assign up to 4 nodes between groups 1 and 2 but the total of both groups cannot exceed 4. Example (Group 1) 3 Nodes, (Group 2) 1 Nodes.

parameter.name: wakeup_interval
parameter.label: Wakeup Period
parameter.description: Set the wakeup period in seconds

parameter.name: wakeup_node
parameter.label: Wakeup Node
parameter.description: The node to which wakeup messages will be sent
